DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Gathering health information patient non-small cell lung cancer never smoke cigarette may help doctor learn disease . Collecting store sample blood patient cancer study laboratory may help doctor learn cancer identify biomarkers related cancer . PURPOSE : This research study study internet-based clinical information blood sample collection patient non-small cell lung cancer never smoke cigarette .
DOC.brief_title: Internet-Based Clinical Information Blood Sample Collection From Patients With Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer Who Never Smoked Cigarettes
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To assess feasibility internet-based protocol collect clinical information biological specimens 2,000 never smoker non-small cell lung cancer . - To perform genome-wide association study identify allele predispose lung cancer patient never smoke cigarette . OUTLINE : Patients complete internet-based questionnaire use REDCap ( Research Electronic Data Capture ) survey determine eligibility . The survey consist detailed smoking questionnaire question collect information regard diagnosis , sex , age , ethnicity , treatment history , history previous malignancy . Blood sample collect eligible patient DNA laboratory analysis . Patients ' pathology report also review .
DOC.criteria: 18 year old histologically and/or cytologically proven diagnosis nonsmall cell lung cancer never smoker , define smoke less 100 cigarettes one 's lifetime complete survey inclusion form sign informed consent previous history cancer ( lung cancer , except superficial skin cancer ) live outside United States patient read English ( material write English ) unable understand protocol give inform consent
